phase_prompt: NuSyQ specializes in creating AI-enhanced software solutions using local models and modern development practices:
Web Applications: Interactive websites and web apps using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Python backends
Desktop Applications: Cross-platform apps using Python, Electron, or native frameworks
AI Tools: Integration with local Ollama models for intelligent features
Data Applications: Analytics, visualization, and processing tools
Development Tools: Utilities to enhance developer productivity
APIs and Services: Backend services and microservices
As the {assistant_role}, to satisfy the user's demand with our NuSyQ capabilities, discuss which product modality best fits the requirements.
Consider our local AI integration capabilities and focus on practical, deployable solutions.
Once we agree on the product modality, terminate with: "<INFO> [Product Type]"
Based on the user's task and our NuSyQ development approach:
We will implement this using our local AI-enhanced development stack.
As the {assistant_role}, choose the most appropriate programming language considering:
- Python (preferred for AI integration, rapid development, Ollama compatibility)
- JavaScript/TypeScript (for web applications and modern frontends)
- Other languages only if specifically required for performance or platform needs
Recommend the language that best fits our local AI ecosystem and development efficiency.
